Package main

Class IslandTrader

  • java.lang.Object
    • main.IslandTrader
  • public class IslandTrader
extends java.lang.Object
    Manages the IslandTrader game, allowing the Player to travel to Islands and trade goods in Stores

    • Field Summary

    • Constructor Detail

      • IslandTrader

        public IslandTrader​(IslandTraderUI ui)
        Creates a IslandManager with the given user interface. Then initializes the world objects such as Stores, Islands and the Player.
        Parameters:
        ui - The user interface that this manager should use

    • Method Detail

      • start

        public void start()
        Starts this IslandTrader. This method calls IslandTraderUI.setup(IslandTrader) to initiate setup of the user interface.

      • onSetupFinished

        public void onSetupFinished()
        This method should be called by the user interface when IslandTraderUI.setup(IslandTrader) has been completed. This method calls IslandTraderUI.start() to tell the user interface to start.

      • onFinish

        public void onFinish()
        This method should be called by the IslandTraderUI when the user has requested to quit the application. This method calls IslandTraderUI.quit() after first confirming the user really wants to quit.

        Returns:

      • getUI

        Gets the ui attached to the game
        Returns:
        the ui

      • gameScore

        public int gameScore()
        Gets the game score illustrating how well the player has done. Points are awarded for profit. Points are deducted if you could not keep playing before the time was up
        Returns:
        a score integer, can be negative or positive

      • selectShip

        public void selectShip​(int option)
        Sets the ship the player has chosen. Option

      • validatePurchase

        public FailureState validatePurchase​(PricedItem purchase)
        This method validates if the player can purchase an item given their money, given the storage on this ship
        Parameters:
        purchase - , the priced item that player is attempting to purchase
        Returns:
        FailureState, Enum representing outcome of the validation

      • buyStoreItem

        public void buyStoreItem​(int option)
        This method transacts a purchase of an item in a store. Returns the purchased item if successful
        Parameters:
        option - The 0 based index of the item in the store's Store.getToSellList() list

      • validateSale

        public FailureState validateSale​(PricedItem sale)
        This method validates if the player can sell an item to a store given them having the item
        Parameters:
        sale - , the priced item that player is attempting to sale
        Returns:
        FailureState, Enum representing outcome of the validation

      • sellStoreItem

        public void sellStoreItem​(int option)
        This method transacts a sale of an item to a store. Returns the sold item if successful
        Parameters:
        option - The 0 based index of the item in the store's Store.getToBuyList() list

      • validateRoute

        public FailureState validateRoute​(Route route)
        This method returns a boolean indicating if the user can sail a route given their money and remaining gametime
        Parameters:
        route - , the route the user wishes to sale on
        Returns:
        FailureState, Enum representing outcome of the validation

      • validateRepair

        public FailureState validateRepair​(Ship ship)
        This method returns a boolean indicating if the user has enough money to repair their ship
        Parameters:
        ship - , the ship to repair
        Returns:
        FailureState, Enum representing outcome of the validation

      • validate

        public FailureState validate​(java.lang.Object obj)
        This method validates if the user can buy / sell / travel an Item or route. Helper method to enable the ui to highlight better options for the user
        Parameters:
        obj - , the object being validated as a option for the user
        Returns:
        FailureState, Enum representing outcome of the validation

      • sailRoute

        public void sailRoute​(int option)
        Sails the route
        Parameters:
        option - , the route index chosen by the user in the route list from the current island

      • triggerRandomSailingEvent

        public void triggerRandomSailingEvent​(RandomEvent event)
        Triggers the random event attached to the route if it is randomly called. A random number between 1-100 is created, if the event probability is lower than this then trigger the event
        Parameters:
        event - , the event to potentially trigger randomly

      • repairShip

        public void repairShip()
        Method called to repair this ship. Deducts money from the player and creates a transaction record
